info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 4:51PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Grant and east central Hidalgo Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 451 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Hachita. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hachita, Playas, Hachita Valley, Playas Valley and Big Hatchet Refuge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
